com.ibm.mq.explorer.ms0s.mqsceditor.gui

Class MQSCAutoIndentStrategy

  • java.lang.Object
    • DefaultIndentLineAutoEditStrategy
      • com.ibm.mq.explorer.ms0s.mqsceditor.gui.MQSCAutoIndentStrategy

  • public class MQSCAutoIndentStrategy
extends DefaultIndentLineAutoEditStrategy

    This performs indentation on lines in the MQSC Document as relevant based on their content. This probably doesn't get used.

                               throws BadLocationException
        Returns the line number of the next bracket after end.
        Parameters:
        document - - the document being parsed
        line - - the line to start searching back from
        end - - the end position to search back from
        closingBracketIncrease - - the number of brackets to skip
        Throws:
        BadLocationException
